info.brief_description: An interactive about your life after being shrunk.
info.description:
Your name is Hank, you are 15 years old and live with your sister Jill (18) brother Justin (13) mom and dad (both 51) dog (Bloodhound) and cat. You have a two story suburban home, and lead an average life.

Anything is allowed here, whatever you may like, just use good grammar when adding and try not to be too brief. Have fun and lets write a story.
